goal: My calendar is completely open on the weekend of the 22nd. Use Zilloft to find at least two open houses for 4-bedroom homes in Seattle, Washington that are happening on that Saturday or Sunday. Block out the specific times for each open house on my GoCalendar.

evals.description: Verify that at least two open house events were added to the GoCalendar.
Verify that the first added event's title indicates an 'Open House'.
Verify that the second added event's title indicates an 'Open House'.
Verify that both added events have specific start and end times (are not all-day events).
